title: Sales contracts; filing with the director
context: ยง441-32.5 Sales contracts; filing with the director. Every cemetery or pre-need funeral authority shall file with the director a copy of all existing contract forms, and any new contract form prior to its use, relating to the selling of cemetery property or pre-need services and related commodities. The content of the contract shall be in conformance with section 441-22.5(b). [L 1981, c 221, ยง23; am L 1985, c 101, ยง14]
